basic.origin: China, Philippines, Japan, Former Soviet Union
basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color white

maintenance.soil: Fertile soil from deep silt loam with more than 2% organic matter
maintenance.sunlight: Need adequate sunshine, difficult to flower at shaded places
maintenance.fertilization: One monthly planting, top-dressing once with manure, then every spring top-dressing once to twice if needed, apply organic fertilizers if possible.
